verses.name: 1 Samuel 10:7
verses.text: And let it be, when these signs are come unto thee, that thou do as occasion serve thee; for God is with thee.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 10:8
verses.text: And thou shalt go down before me to Gilgal; and, behold, I will come down unto thee, to offer burnt offerings, and to sacrifice sacrifices of peace offerings: seven days shalt thou tarry, till I come to thee, and shew thee what thou shalt do.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 10:9
verses.text: And it was so, that when he had turned his back to go from Samuel, God gave him another heart: and all those signs came to pass that day.
